description: Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported when an activity occurs from a location that wasn't recently or never visited by any user in the organization. Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Activity from Infrequent Country
query: (eventSource:"SecurityComplianceCenter" AND eventName:"Activity\ from\ infrequent\ country" AND status:"success")
